DOC.brief_summary: Comparison prophylaxis on-demand treatment child moderate severe hemophilia A . This study determine compare efficacy prophylaxis on-demand treatment moderate severe hemophilia A child King Chulalongkorn Memorial Hospital , Bangkok , Thailand
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Prophylaxis On-demand Treatment Children With Moderate Severe Hemophilia A
DOC.criteria: Age 6 month 18 year Diagnosis severe moderate hemophilia A platelet < 100,000/mm3 No factor VIII inhibitor
